name: Download Files Using Notepad++ GUP Utility
description: Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater (gup) from a process other than Notepad++ to download files.
false_positives: Other parent processes other than notepad++ using GUP that are not currently identified
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((process.executable:*\\GUP.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:gup.exe) AND (process.command_line:*\ \-unzipTo\ * AND process.command_line:*http*)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:*\\notepad\+\+.exe)))`
